==Abilities==
''Most ability names are unofficial.''

{{Enemy Attacks
|name_1 = Stab
|desc_1 = Performs a quick stab with their polearm, dealing '''100% ATK''' as {{Color|Physical DMG}}.

|name_2 = Swing
|desc_2 = Performs an upward swing with their polearm, dealing '''100% ATK''' as {{Color|Physical DMG}}.

|name_3 = Spear Combo
|desc_3 = Performs 3 consecutive stabs with their polearm, dealing '''100% ATK''' as {{Color|Physical DMG}} with each stab.

|name_4 = Dodge
|desc_4 = Jumps backwards away from the player.

|name_5 = Rally
|desc_5 = The Shogunate Infantry Captain rallies nearby [[Shogunate Infantry|Shogunate Infantries]], causing them to perform '''3-Stab Combo'''.
|file_5 = Shogunate Infantry Stab 2
}}
